years.description:
Shih Chien College of Home Economics established
實踐家政專科學校成立

Department of Arts and Crafts established
設立 美術工藝科

Shih Chien College of Home Economics renamed as Shih Chien College of Home Economics and Economics
實踐家政經濟專科學校 更名為 實踐家政經濟專科學校

• Department of Arts and Crafts renamed as Department of Applied Arts
美術工藝科 更名為 應用美術科
• Division of Visual Communication Design established
設立 視覺傳達設計組

Shih Chien College of Home Economics and Economics upgraded to & renamed as Shih Chien College of Design and Management
實踐家政經濟專科學校 改制並更名為 實踐設計管理學院

BFA 學士班
• Shih Chien College of Design and Management renamed as Shih Chien University
實踐設計管理學院 更名為 實踐大學
• College of Design established
設立 設計學院
• Department of Visual Communication Design established
設立 視覺傳達設計學系

BFA 學士班
Department of Visual Communication Design renamed as Department of Communications Design
視覺傳達設計學系 更名為 媒體傳達設計學系

BFA 學士班
• Division of Digital 3D Animation Design established
設立 數位 3D 動畫設計組
• Division of Digital Creative Game Design established
設立 數位遊戲創意設計組
MDES 碩士班
Institute of Fashion and Communications Design established (with Institute of Fashion Design)
設立 時尚與媒體設計研究所（與服裝設計研究所）

MDES 碩士班
Division of Digital Media Design established
設立 數位媒體設計組

MDES 碩士班
Division of Digital Media Design, IFCD merged into (Merge Department and Institute Into One) Master Class & Master Class for Working Professionals, SCCD
時尚與媒體設計研究所數位媒體設計組 整併（系所合一）為 媒體傳達設計學系碩士班與碩士在職專班

BFA 學士班
Division of Digital Creative Game Design renamed as Division of Innovative Media Design
數位遊戲創意設計組 更名為 創新媒體設計組

MDES 碩士班
Master Class for Working Professionals stop enrollment
碩士在職專班 停招

BFA 學士班
Division of Innovative Media Design renamed as Division of Creative Media Design
創新媒體設計組 更名為 創意媒體設計組

BFA 學士班
Division of Digital 3D Animation Design renamed as Division of Animation & Moving Image
數位 3D 動畫設計組 更名為 動畫影像設計組
